menu.enchantencore.desc.wiki.option: Pick an Enchantment you'd like to learn more about.
§nRegrowth§r

Max Level: I

Compatible with: Hoes

Replants fully grown Crops when harvested
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:plow.desc:
§nPlow§r

Max Level: III

Compatible with: Hoes

Tills a larger area with left-click
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:ghost_spi:
§nGhost Spirit§r

Max Level: I

Compatible with: Wolf Armor

Makes your Wolf almost invincible but it also has 0 attack damage
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:implosion:
§nImplosion§r

Max Level: I

Compatible with: Crossbows, Bows

Pulls in hostile entities within a 5 block radius
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:trial_run:
§nTrial Runner§r

Max Level: I

Compatible with: Boots

Gives the wearer the Trial Omen effect but drains durability
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:heroes_cr:
§nHeroes Crown§r

Max Level: I

Compatible with: Helmets

Gives the wearer the Hero of the Village effect but drains durability
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:replenish:
§nReplenish§r

Max Level: I

Compatible with: Crossbows, Bows

50% Chance to not consume an arrow, tipped arrow, spectral arrow or firework when shot
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:illuminat:
§nIllumination§r

Max Level: III

Compatible with: Helmets

Lightens up the area around you when headblock is not obstructed
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:shulker_s:
§nShulker Shell§r

Max Level: I

Compatible with: Chestplates

Firework, Tridents, (Spectral) Arrows shot at the wearer fall to the ground when wearer stands still
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:crank_cur:
§nCurse of Crank§r

Max Level: I

Compatible with: Armor

Hurts the wearer when not moving
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:pegasus.d:
§nPegasus§r

Max Level: I

Compatible with: Horse Armor

Horses fly up to 30 Blocks in the air when mounted. Dismounting gives slow falling to land safely
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:flare.des:
§nFlare§r

Max Level: V

Compatible with: Crossbows, Bows

Arrows explode like fireworks when they land or hit an entity
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:boltbring:
§nBoltbringer§r

Max Level: I

Compatible with: Maces

Summons lightning when entity was hit by a player which at least fell 8 blocks
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:sea_breez:
§nSea Breeze§r

Max Level: III

Compatible with: Tridents

Wind Charges hit entities away when hit by thrown trident
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:seeker.de:
§nSeeker§r

Max Level: III

Compatible with: Helmets

Highlights Items in a 4-12 block radius depending on the level
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:death_cur:
§nCurse of Death§r

Max Level: I

Compatible with: Swords

Small chance of dying when attacking
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:breeze_cu:
§nCurse of Breeze§r

Max Level: I

Compatible with: Swords

Wind charges entity on attack
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:bane_of_b:
§nBane of Bosses§r

Max Level: V

Compatible with: Axes, Swords, Maces, Tridents

Inflicts more damage to boss mobs
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:bane_of_n:
§nBane of Netherborn§r

Max Level: V

Compatible with: Axes, Swords, Maces, Tridents

Inflicts more damage to Nether mobs
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:bane_of_e:
§nBane of Endborn§r

Compatible with: Axes, Swords, Maces, Tridents

Inflicts more damage to End mobs
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:bane_of_r:

Max Level: V

Compatible with: Axes, Swords, Maces, Tridents

Inflicts more damage to raid mobs
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:bomber.de:
§nBomber§r

Max Level: II

Compatible with: Corssbows, Bows

Arrows explode when an entity was hit
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:bulletpro:

Max Level: I

Compatible with: Armor

§nBunny Hop§r

Max Level: III

Compatible with: Leggings

Let's you jump higher
enchantment_lore.enchantencore:cleansing:

Max Level: I

Compatible with: Shields

enchantment_lore.enchantencore:end_speed:

Compatible with: Boots
